<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataTG extends data { const CODE = 'TG'; const PREFIX = 228; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '[279]\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '2(?:2[2-7]|3[23]|4[45]|55|6[67]|77)\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:7[09]|9[0-36-9])\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
